titleStmt.title: እስመ᎓ በከመ᎓ ኮነ᎓ ላቲ᎓ መድኅነ᎓ ዓለም᎓ ክርስቶስ᎓
ʾƎsma bakama kona lati madḫəna ʿālam Krəstos
How was for her Christ, the Saviour of the World.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

abstract.p: Theological treatise concerning Incarnation, apparantly translated from Latin not before the 17th century, containing references to the works of Caesar Baronius and ancient and Byzantine authors (quoted thereafter).

div.label: On how St. Mary was selected.
div.ab: ከመ᎓ ተኃርየት᎓ ድንግል᎓ ማርያም᎓ ለከዊነ᎓ እመ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓

div.label: One tells that she was from the lineage of David.
div.ab: ዘይዜኑ᎓ ከመ᎓ ኮነት᎓ እም᎓ ነገደ᎓ ዳዊት᎓

div.label: One explains that this virgin was engaged with Joseph.
div.ab: ዘያሌቡ᎓ ከመ᎓ ዛቲ᎓ ድንግል᎓ ተፍህተት᎓ ለዮሴፍ᎓

div.label: One tells that the Mother of God was poor.
div.ab: ዘይዜኑ᎓ ከመ᎓ ወላዲተ᎓ አምላክ᎓ ኮነት᎓ ነዳይት᎓ ውስተ᎓

div.label: One tells how Angel Gabriel was sent to her.
div.ab: ዘይዜኑ᎓ ከመ᎓ ተፈነወ᎓ ኀቤሃ᎓ ገብርኤል᎓ መልአከ᎓ ለአብስሮ᎓

div.label: One tells as to how this was orderedOctavianus Caesar Augustus.
div.ab: ዘይነግር᎓ ትእዛዘ᎓ ዝኩ᎓ አክጥትያኖስ᎓ አውግስጦስ᎓ ቄሳር።

div.label: One tells that Christ chose Bethlehem to be born there, and Jerusalem to die there.
div.ab: ዘይዜኑ᎓ ከመ᎓ ክርስቶስሃ᎓ ኃረየሃ᎓ ለቤተ᎓ ልሔም᎓ ይትወለድ᎓ ባቲ᎓ ወይሙት᎓ በኢየሩሳሌም።

div.label: About the peaceful time when the heavenly palace descended upon us from above.
div.ab: ዘይዜኑ᎓ ዘመነ᎓ ሰላማዊት᎓ ዘባቲ᎓ መጽአ᎓ ኀቤነ᎓ እምላዕሉ᎓ ዝኩ᎓ ታዕካ᎓ ሰላማዊት᎓

div.label: One tells that there were many signs and great prophecies before the advent of Christ, and why they took place.
div.ab: ዘይዜኑ᎓ ከመ᎓ ኮኑ᎓ ብዙኃን᎓ ትእምርታት᎓ ወባሕላት᎓ ዓቢያት᎓ እምቅመ᎓ መጽአቱ᎓ ለክርስቶስ᎓ ወከመ᎓ በእንተ᎓ ምክንያት᎓ ኮኑ፨
